title: Behemoth’s Pet - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Appearance Changes   Beast Companions   Beastkin   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Elves   Evolution   Famous Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Mythical Beasts   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Pets   R-15   Race Change   Reincarnated as a Monster   Skill Assimilation   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong   Yandere
author: Ginyoku Nozomi   銀翼のぞみ
description:
The elf girl, Aria is an adventurer. Her enchanting, lovely features attracts everyone. Her twin peaks are ripened to the point of exploding. Then, being embraced in between those twin peaks was a little animal… his name is Tama.

He looks like to be a cat at first glance, but Aria and her surrounding companions failed to take notice of single detail. Tama, he’s a human who’d reincarnated, given a second chance at life. His true form, it’s not that of an ordinary cat. Instead, he’s a monster of the strongest class, an extremely young behemoth.>
